reference.title: ListVirtualNetworks
reference.shortdesc: You can use the ListVirtualNetworks method to list all configured virtual networks for the cluster.

section.p: You can use this method to verify the virtual network settings in the cluster. There are no required parameters for this method. However, to filter the results, you can pass one or more virtualNetworkID or virtualNetworkTag values.

section.title: Parameters
section.p: This method has the following input parameters:

row.entry: Network ID to filter the list for a single virtual network.
Network tag to filter the list for a single virtual network.
Network IDs to include in the list.
Network tag to include in the list.

section.title: Return value
section.p: This method has the following return value:

row.entry: Object containing virtual network IP addresses.
